alert.note: Alert for Blount; Cocke; Jefferson; Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:22PM CDT until August 12 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Blount County in east Tennessee... Southern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Southern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Sevier County in east Tennessee... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Dandridge to Pigeon Forge to near Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Bird Crossing, Fairgarden, and Wears Valley. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 439 and 451. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
